channel.title: Building on Buster fails
channel.description: When building the latest version of whonix on buster the builder script 1120_prepare-build-machine tries to install the "virtualbox-source" and "virtualbox-qt" packages. Since they are not available on buster it fails.

item.title: Building on Buster fails
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There are no VirtualBox packages in Debian buster whatsoever. None.

https://packages.debian.org/search?keywords=virtualbox

[1] VirtualBox from VirtualBox repository might work too but I trust Debian sid over VirtualBox repository.

Third party repositories are discouraged as per:

Whonix

Install Software

Installing additional Software on Whonix ™. Safety considerations.

sve:

I was able to successfully build using this method but it’s a dirty hack

Agreed however no better option than Whonix VirtualBox deprecation.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Virtualization_Platform#Arguments_for_keeping_VirtualBox_Support

sve:

and it’s not recommended by debian creators.

They have valid point too, however see [1].

Read full topic

item.title: Building on Buster fails
item.dc:creator: sve
item.description:
I was able to successfully build using this method but it’s a dirty hack and it’s not recommended by debian creators. Are virtualbox-source, virtualbox-qt and virtualbox-dkms packages really needed or a simple virtualbox package from the virtualbox official repo is enough?

Read full topic

item.title: Building on Buster fails
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
Need to be installed from Debian sid.

Read full topic

item.title: Building on Buster fails
item.dc:creator: sve
item.description:
When building the latest version of whonix on buster the builder script 1120_prepare-build-machine tries to install the “virtualbox-source” and “virtualbox-qt” packages. Since they are not available on buster it fails.
